bioconda.name: pia
bioconda.summary: PIA is a toolbox for MS based protein inference and identification analysis.

biocontainers.name: pia
biocontainers.summary: The main focus lays on the integrated inference algorithms, concluding the proteins from a set of identified spectra. but it also allows you to inspect your peptide spectrum matches, calculate fdr values across different search engine results and visualize the correspondence between psms, peptides and proteins.

biotools.summary: The main focus lays on the integrated inference algorithms, concluding the proteins from a set of identified spectra. But it also allows you to integrate results of various search engines, inspect your peptide spectrum matches, calculate FDR values across different results and visualize the correspondence between PSMs, peptides and proteins.

bioschemas.name: PIA - Protein Inference Algorithms
bioschemas.summary: The main focus lays on the integrated inference algorithms, concluding the proteins from a set of identified spectra. But it also allows you to integrate results of various search engines, inspect your peptide spectrum matches, calculate FDR values across different results and visualize the correspondence between PSMs, peptides and proteins.
